alert.note: Alert for Cass (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 11:11AM EST until February 13 at 8:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches bringing storm total snow accumulations since this morning of 3 to 7 inches by this evening. * WHERE...Cass MI County. The greatest accumulations are expected across western and northwestern portions of Cass County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and sudden reductions in visibilities to less than one quarter of a mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
